deployment_mode_description: Select an optimal configuration to ensure the availability, resilience and latency appropriate for your data depending on your use cases. <Link>Find out more</Link>
deployment_mode_card_description_region: Resilient and cost-effective deployment on 1 availability zone.
deployment_mode_card_description_region-: High-resilience/high-availability deployment for your critical applications across 3 availability zones.
deployment_mode_card_description_localzo: Deploy your applications as close as possible to your users, for low latency and data residency.
